tr.td: All randomised patients who receive at least part of one infusion of study treatment
According to the intent‐to‐treat principle, and includes all patients from the SAF population for whom data were collected post‐infusion of study treatment
A subset of the FAS, which excludes patients with significant protocol deviations that could potentially significantly affect evaluation of the primary outcome a

fn.p: FAS, full analysis set; PPS, per‐protocol set; SAF, safety set.

fn.label: a
fn.p: The classification of protocol violations will be conducted and documented before the database is locked, the data is unblinded and the statistical analyses are performed.
